channel.title: Led on clayto
channel.description: Recent content in Led on clayto

item.title: Meet SimPixel
item.description: I have someone I’d like you to meet. SimPixel, meet everyone. Everyone, SimPixel. SimPixel introduces itself SimPixel is a WebGL visualizer for LED displays, very much like the ones Adam and Dan build over at Maniacal Labs. #mlabs { height: 50vh !important; } @media screen and (min-width: 660px) { #mlabs { float: right; margin-left: 20px; } } My working theory about why it’s so much like their displays is that I built most of SimPixel while sitting at Adam’s workbench.
